Overview

Greenfield Public School (CBSE) is a co-educational day school in Nagpur focused on holistic development—strong academics, values, sports, and arts. Our approach blends experiential learning with modern pedagogy and digital tools.

Recognition & Affiliations

CBSE Affiliation British Council ISA ATL (NITI Aayog) ISO 9001:2015

Committed to quality and continuous improvement with regular teacher training and audits.

Vision & Values

We nurture curious, confident learners who think critically and act compassionately. Emphasis on discipline, collaboration, and leadership through everyday routines and projects.

Parent Partnership

Transparent communication via LMS, monthly PTMs, and workshops. Parents co-design enrichment programs and career days.

Classes & Fees

Academic structure aligned with NEP: Foundational (Nur–II), Preparatory (III–V), Middle (VI–VIII), Secondary (IX–XII).

Foundational (Nur–II)

  • Play-based learning, phonics, numeracy
  • Safe, colourful classrooms
  • Parent-child events

Annual Fees: ₹55,000 – ₹65,000

Preparatory (III–V)

  • Project-based EVS & Math labs
  • Coding & Library hours
  • Art, music, sports

Annual Fees: ₹60,000 – ₹70,000

Middle (VI–VIII)

  • ATL makerspace, Olympiad prep
  • Clubs & house system
  • Field trips & service

Annual Fees: ₹68,000 – ₹80,000

Secondary (IX–XII)

  • Streams: Science, Commerce, Humanities
  • JEE/NEET/CA Foundation support
  • Career guidance, internships

Annual Fees: ₹75,000 – ₹95,000

Admissions

Admissions are merit-based and seat-dependent. Siblings and alumni wards get additional consideration as per policy.

Process

  • Online application form + document upload
  • Interaction (Nur–II) / Aptitude test (III–XI)
  • Principal/Academic panel meet
  • Offer & fee payment within 7 days

Application Window: Sep–Dec (Rolling thereafter)

Documents

  • Birth certificate, Aadhar (student)
  • Previous report card / TC (if applicable)
  • Address proof, photos (parents & student)

Scholarships: Merit & sports (up to 50% tuition)

Fee Policies

Quarterly payment options available. Sibling concessions applicable. One-time admission & caution deposit extra as per class.

Academics & Facilities

Facilities

  • Science, Math & Computer labs
  • Smart classrooms & LMS
  • Library & Reading lounge
  • Playground, courts, indoor arena
  • Transport & Infirmary

Teaching Approach

Blended learning with periodic diagnostics, remedials, and enrichment. Theme weeks, exhibitions, and experiential camps to deepen understanding.

Safety & Wellbeing

CCTV, verified staff, counsellor on campus, POSH & POCSO compliance. SEL curriculum for classes I–VIII.

Clubs & Activities

Co-curricular

DebateMUNRobotics CodingMusicDance ArtDrama

House competitions, inter-school fests, and Olympiads round the year.

Sports

Football, Basketball, Badminton, Cricket, Table Tennis, Athletics with certified coaches and regular fitness assessments.

Community

Service projects with local NGOs, eco-drives, and student leadership councils to build empathy and responsibility.

Campus Gallery

Take a peek at classrooms, labs, sports facilities, and student life.

Additional Information

Our timetable balances academics with arts, sports, and life-skills. Regular assessments guide personalised learning paths. Career guidance begins in Middle School, culminating with stream selection support in Secondary.

Annual events like Science Expo, Literary Fest, and Sports Meet showcase student talent. Exchange programs and industry visits broaden exposure.
